name: Spanish Alphabet Pro
description:
NO in-app purchase!!!
NO advertisements!!!
Just PURE FUN!!!

Be warned: This game is insanely fun for KIDS and for ADULTS also.

******************************************************************************

Learn the Spanish Alphabet in a fun way by matching 3 same letters horizontally, vertically, L-shape, or T-shape pattern.

The Spanish Alphabet have the same 26-letter English Alphabet plus additional four letters: CH, Ň, LL and RR characters.

Swipe to the LEFT, RIGHT, UP, or DOWN to move and match a letter.

Beat your own best score.

Other features:
- Nice graphics animation.
- Nice background music

Have fun playing the game.

Don't forget to right a review and rate it.

Thanks in advance.

******************************************************************************
